reference.fieldDescription: Path (or URL) to a webpage this link should direct to. In case you leave the text and label options empty below - the page properties will be used to determine the link text or, in case the link is outside the pages tree, the URL itself will be placed as the text. Don't add the .html extension in case you point to a page within this system.
reference.name: ./reference

text.fieldDescription: Text / Label that will be used with the highest priority. If you fill something here - it will be used regardless of whatever you entered in the 'Global Label' field below.
text.name: ./text

label.fieldDescription: You can set the label to simply reference some of the global labels that you can configure for a whole page tree. It will be used in case you left the above 'Text' field empty.
label.name: ./label

css.fieldDescription: You can set the button style to either default (white) or info (blue).
css.name: ./css
